pages.text: The uncommon cluster is significantly more complicated to produce than the common one, requiring you to make a base material of richer stone than is found in nature. You can do this by mixing molten cobblestone with an iron nugget, a copper nugget, and five redstone dust.

To process this into a completed cluster that can have coalmeal applied to it, you must first heat it at blast furnace temperatures, hotter than a normal furnace. You must then mix in sawdust from any tree in the nether dimension, and finally cool it in a freezer or blast chiller. The uncommon cluster yeilds aluminum, tin, and quartz in addition to the yeilds of the common cluster.
